verses.verse: How blessed<WH835> is the man<WH376> who<WH834> does not walk<WH1980> in the counsel<WH6098> of the wicked,<WH7563> Nor<WH3808> stand<WH5975> in the path<WH1870> of sinners,<WH2400> Nor<WH3808> sit<WH3427> in the seat<WH4186> of scoffers!<WH9238>
But his delight<WH2656> is in the law<WH8451> of the Lord,<WH3068> And in His law<WH8451> he meditates<WH1897> day<WH3119> and night.<WH3915>

And he will be like a tree<WH6086> [firmly] planted<WH8362> by streams<WH6388> of water,<WH4325> Which<WH834> yields<WH5414> its fruit<WH6529> in its season,<WH6256> And its leaf<WH5929> does not wither;<WH5034> And in whatever<WH3605> <WH834> he does,<WH6213> he prospers.<WH6743>
The wicked<WH7563> are not so,<WH3651> But they are like chaff<WH4671> which<WH834> the wind<WH7307> drives<WH5086> away.<WH5086>
Therefore<WH5921> <WH3651> the wicked<WH7563> will not stand<WH6965> in the judgment,<WH4941> Nor<WH3808> sinners<WH2400> in the assembly<WH5712> of the righteous.<WH6662>
For the Lord<WH3068> knows<WH3045> the way<WH1870> of the righteous,<WH6662> But the way<WH1870> of the wicked<WH7563> will perish.
